comments:
Debugging an application with cyclic projects results in a stack overflow error. (Sorry: I did 
not test running the application.)

Project A includes Project B into its build 
path.
Project B includes Project A into its build path.

In earlier versions (I used build 
20020410) this resulted in a warning in the task-view, but worked well.

In F2, this leads to a 
stack overflow (see below) - forcing me to exit eclipse.


Looks like an inifinite loop (by 
recursion) to me and might happen in other places than debugging: running for example. Did not 
test this.
